Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAdmin
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAdmin"
CreateXMbxSearch SOAP Command

Creates a search task

Network edition only API TRUE
Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required true

CreateXMbxSearchRequest

    <CreateXMbxSearchRequest> ## CreateXMbxSearchRequest
        (<a n="{key}">{value}</a> ## KeyValuePair)*
    </CreateXMbxSearchRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <CreateXMbxSearchRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/a Optional (0 or more) Type:{value}
Key Value pairs
Description for element text content:Value
/a@n Required (only 1) Type:String
Key

CreateXMbxSearchResponse

    <CreateXMbxSearchResponse> ## CreateXMbxSearchResponse
        <searchtask> ## SearchNode
            (<a n="{key}" /> ## Attr)*
        </searchtask>
    </CreateXMbxSearchResponse>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <CreateXMbxSearchResponse> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/searchtask Required (only 1) Search task information
/searchtask/a Optional (0 or more) Attributes
/searchtask/a@n Required (only 1) Type:String
Key
